page.title: 12A 'VISITER' EMPLOYEE
page.content: Rod's job was a compositer which was to put the articles on to pages for the paper.He worked at the "Visiter" for 16\ years starting with a 6 year apprenticeship when he earned 25% of the normal wage.When he left he was earning Â£199.80 inclusive of overtime. Rod enjoyed his job although he wasn't sorry to leave.He didn't much enjoy the last year because it was getting boring.He said:"I enjoyed the office but I didn't like the last eight months". Rod got ovetime pay,which he did often to earn some extra money,which he said came in handy,to pay bills and so on. Rod said that he didn't think he was under paid.
